attributes.action: Make it illegal for firms contracting for goverment contracts to pay less then £1.00 above minimin wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the goverment made it illegal for companies tendering for contracts to pay employees less than a £1.00 per hour above the legal minimum wage.   This would help to cut the amount of monies that the goverment has to spend on benifites to the low waged
